alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and south central Willacy Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from near Porfirio to Dishman Elementary School to near Indian Hills to San Carlos to B.l. Garza Middle School. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A mesonet site northwest of Elsa measured a wind gust of 30mph as the outflow boundary moved through. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Pharr, Harlingen, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Mercedes and La Feria. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 21 and 36. Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 1 and 12. US Highway 281 between mile markers 784 and 818. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo
